Member Function Documentation

tx_oop_Typo3_Core_Engine::__call ( $  name,
array $  args = array() 
)

PHP method calls overloading.

This method will reroute all the call on this object to the TCE object.

Parameters:
string The name of the called method
array The arguments for the called method
Returns:
mixed The result of the TCE method called
Exceptions:
tx_oop_Typo3_Core_Engine_Exception If the called method does not exist

Definition at line 88 of file Engine.class.php.

tx_oop_Typo3_Core_Engine::__clone (  ) 

Clones an instance of the class.

A call to this method will produce an exception, as the class cannot be cloned (singleton).

Returns:
NULL
Exceptions:
tx_oop_Core_Singleton_Exception Always, as the class cannot be cloned (singleton)

Gets the unique class instance.
